meanings.definition: A day set aside for play or recreation.
meanings.sent1: On our playday, we went to the park and had a picnic.
meanings.sent2: Saturday is usually our playday when we have fun as a family.
meanings.sent3: The playday at school was filled with games and laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her birthday felt like a magical playday with all her friends around.
meanings.sent5: The playday in the summer camp was the highlight of the season.

meanings.definition: To engage in play or recreation.
meanings.sent1: Children love to playday in the playground after school.
meanings.sent2: After finishing their homework, the kids playday in the backyard.
meanings.sent3: The puppies playday in the yard, chasing each other happily.
meanings.sent4: The siblings playday together, creating imaginary worlds in their games.
meanings.sent5: During the weekend, families often playday at the beach, building sandcastles and swimming.
